verses.verse: Whence Come <S%G4159><s%> Wars <S%G4171><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fightings <S%G3163><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You? <S%G5213><s%> It Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Thence, <S%G1782><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2237><s%> Your Pleasures, <S%G5216><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> War <S%G4754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3196><s%> Your Members? <S%G5216><s%>

Ye Desire, <S%G1937><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not; <S%G2192><s%> Ye Kill <S%G5407><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are Emulous, <S%G2206><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Obtain; <S%G2013><s%> Ye Fight <S%G3164><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> War, <S%G4170><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Have Not <S%G2192><s%>, But <S%G1161><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Ask <S%G154><s%> You <S%G5209><s%>

Ye Ask, <S%G154><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Receive Not, <S%G2983><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> Evilly <S%G2560><s%> Ye Ask <S%G154><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2237><s%> Your Pleasures <S%G5216><s%> Ye May Spend It. <S%G1159><s%>

Adulterers <S%G3432><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adulteresses, <S%G3428><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Know Ye Not <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Friendship <S%G5373><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Enmity With <S%G2189><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Is? <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whosoever <S%G302><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Be Minded <S%G1014><s%> A Friend <S%G5384><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> An Enemy <S%G2190><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Is Constituted. <S%G2525><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> Think Ye <S%G1380><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In Vain <S%G2761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Speaks? <S%G3004><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Envy <S%G5355><s%> Does Long <S%G1971><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Took Up His Abode <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us? <S%G2254><s%>

<S%G3173><s%> But Greater <S%G1161><s%> He Gives <S%G1325><s%> Grace. <S%G5485><s%> Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The Proud <S%G5244><s%> Sets Himself Against, <S%G498><s%> <S%G5011><s%> But To The Lowly <S%G1161><s%> He Gives <S%G1325><s%> Grace. <S%G5485><s%>

Subject Yourselves <S%G5293><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%> Resist <S%G436><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Flee <S%G5343><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

Draw Near <S%G1448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Draw Near <S%G1448><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%> Have Cleansed <S%G2511><s%> Your Hands, <S%G5495><s%> Sinners, <S%G268><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Purified <S%G48><s%> Your Hearts, <S%G2588><s%> Ye Double Minded. <S%G1374><s%>

Be Wretched, <S%G5003><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourn, <S%G3996><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weep. <S%G2799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1071><s%> Your Laughter <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Mourning <S%G3997><s%> Let Be Turned, <S%G3344><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your Joy <S%G5479><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Heaviness. <S%G2726><s%>
Humble Yourselves <S%G5013><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Exalt <S%G5312><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Speak Not Against <S%G2635><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks Against <S%G2635><s%> His Brother, <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> Speaks Against The <S%G2635><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judges The <S%G2919><s%> Law. <S%G3551><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If The <S%G1161><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Thou Judgest, <S%G2919><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> A Doer <S%G4163><s%> Of The Law, <S%G3551><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Judge. <S%G2923><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lawgiver, <S%G3550><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Destroy : <S%G622><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> That <S%G3739><s%> Judgest <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other? <S%G2087><s%>

Go To <S%G71><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> Ye Who <S%G3588><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tomorrow <S%G839><s%> We May Go <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3592><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A City <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Spend <S%G4160><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Year <S%G1763><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Traffic, <S%G1710><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Make Gain, <S%G2770><s%>

Ye Who <S%G3748><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Know <S%G1987><s%> What <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow Will Be, <S%G839><s%> <S%G4169><s%> For What Is <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2222><s%> Your Life? <S%G5216><s%> A Vapour <S%G822><s%> Even <S%G1063><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Little While <S%G3641><s%> Appears, <S%G5316><s%> Then <S%G1899><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Disappears, <S%G853><s%>

Instead Of <S%G473><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Your Saying, <S%G5209><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Should Will <S%G2309><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Should Live, <S%G2198><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We May Do <S%G4160><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> That. <S%G1565><s%>

<S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> Ye Boast <S%G2744><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G212><s%> Your Vauntings : <S%G5216><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Boasting <S%G2746><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Evil <S%G4190><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

To Him Knowing <S%G1492><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Doing It, <S%G4160><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>
